name: Legal Link
description: Legal Link removes legal barriers for people living in poverty. Their team works to educate and equip low-income families and their advocates with the information and tools they need to more effectively navigate the legal system.
fullDescription: Legal Link removes legal barriers for people living in poverty. Their team works to educate and equip low-income families and their advocates with the information and tools they need to more effectively navigate the legal system.
whatTheyOffer: Legal Link removes legal barriers for people living in poverty. Their team works to educate and equip low-income families and their advocates with the information and tools they need to more effectively navigate the legal system.
